Package au.edu.anu.twuifx.mr.view

Class MRControllerfx

java.lang.Object
au.edu.anu.twuifx.mr.view.MRControllerfx
All Implemented Interfaces:
au.edu.anu.omhtk.preferences.Preferenceable, au.edu.anu.twapps.mr.MRController
public class MRControllerfx extends Object implements au.edu.anu.twapps.mr.MRController
Javafx Controller for ModelRunnerfx. The language specific ModelRunner FXML file is injected into fields in this class. NB: Do not change field names in this field without corresponding change in each language FXML file.
Author:
Ian Davies - 18 Jan. 2018
